title: Bug 6322 - All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322 - All types dialog displays obfuscated classes. JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d), etc.
OB: Obfuscated classes such as 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd' are prominently visible in the Open Type dialog.
EB: The Open Type dialog should not display obfuscated classes, providing a cleaner and more user-friendly interface.
SR: Options: a) Sort lower case class names after those starting with a capital letter. b) Completely filter out obfuscated classes. I suggest implementing option a).
